context: 2 Alternative performance measures continued Net debt to earnings before interest, tax, depreciation and amortisation (EBITDA) To assess the size of the net debt balance relative to the size of the earnings for the Group, we analyse net debt as a proportion of EBITDA. EBITDA is calculated by adding back depreciation and amortisation of owned property, plant and equipment, software and development to adjusted operating profit.
